title: Liu Gang (boxer)
text:
Liu Gang is a Chinese former <a href="Olympic%20Games">Olympic</a> <a href="boxer">boxer</a>. He represented his country in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics">flyweight</a> division at the <a href="1992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992 Summer Olympics</a>. He lost his first bout against <a href="H%C3%A9ctor%20%C3%81vila">Héctor Ávila</a>.
, Liu is a boxing promoter. His family members are Hai Sheng (son), Annie (daughter), and Xin (wife).
